titleStmt.title: The spiritual bee, or, A miscellany of scriptural, historical, natural observations and occasional occurencyes applyed in divine meditations by an university pen
titleStmt.author: University pen.
Horsman, Nicholas, fl. 1689.
Howard, Luke, 1621-1699.
Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. & L. Lichfield for Edw. & Joh. Forrest,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Nicholas Horseman, Luke Howard and also to William Penn.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
